jobDescription: Global Financial Firm located in Chicago, IL has an immediate contract for an experienced Data Analyst Job DescriptionAdd and update customer entities (add, maintain merge) within our CRM system related to the current firm priorities and Distribution initiatives – conferences, platform launches and marketing campaignsPerform adhoc searches and analysis based on sales requestsComplete daily matching of transactions to financial advisors, using information provided and gathered through firm files, independent research via internet and phoneCommunicate with internal and external data providers and customer firms to resolve various data errors that occur in the trade resolution processQualifications 4 year College degree  Verbal and written communication skills – ability to represent within the industry  Previous CRM and data update and maintenance experience, ideally working within Distribution/Sales area of a firm  Highly detail-oriented  Self-motivated and highly organized  Ability to work independently and juggle multiple priorities  Proficient in MS Office products  SQL and Tableau experience is a plus
